headline: Barron’s Hall of Fame Advisor Jennifer Marcontell: Investing Strategies for Today’s Market
summary: It has been a roller-coaster year, with investors rattled by tariff talk in the spring but feeling frisky by August.  “Now I’m getting phone calls from people who are 75 who want to buy stocks they have just now read about online,” says newly inducted Barron’s Hall of Fame advisor Jennifer Marcontell, who manages $1.8 billion from Mont Belvieu, Texas, outside Houston.  Speaking with Barron’s Advisor, Marcontell, a 25-year veteran who moved from Edward Jones to  Ameriprise  three years ago, reveals where she sees investment opportunities now, and why she’s a long-term cryptocurrency believer.
